summary: CHILD CAR SEAT COMPLAINT.   FRONT SAFETY SHIELD ARM ASSEMBLY BROKE OFF ENTIRE SEAT ASSEMBLY.  NARROWLY AVERTING SERIOUS CHILD INJURY.  EVENFLO PRODUCTS DENIED ANY WRONG DOING OR RESTITUTION SINCE THE PRODUCT IS OVER ONE YEAR OLD.  CONSUMER STRONGLY FEELS THAT EVENFLO PRODUCTS SHOULD PROVIDE NEW CAR SEAT SINCE THIS WAS A POTENTIALLY LIFE THREATENING OCCURRENCE.              *TT
